mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grade_distribution(curdate, curgrade, curexp,curusers,curtime,county_code) VALUES (#{curdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curgrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{curexp,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{curusers,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{curtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{countyCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE curdate = VALUES(curdate), curgrade = VALUES(curgrade), curexp = VALUES(curexp), curusers = VALUES(curusers), curtime = VALUES(curtime), county_code = VALUES(county_code);
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as curusers,( SELECT t2.id FROM grade_info t2 WHERE t2.county_code = t1.county_code AND t2.required_experience <= t1.experience ORDER BY id DESC limit 1) curgrade ,t1.county_code FROM `user_exp_int` t1 GROUP BY t1.county_code, curgrade ORDER BY t1.county_code ,curgrade
